Method Detail

chemspiderIdToCompoundName

java.lang.String chemspiderIdToCompoundName(java.lang.String chemspiderId = '')
Parameters:
chemspiderId Chemspider - Identifier (e.g. 4444362)
Returns:
the name of the compound as listed in the Chemspider database. In this case: Rutin

chemspiderUrlByChemspiderId

java.lang.String chemspiderUrlByChemspiderId(java.lang.String chemspiderId = '')
Parameters:
chemspiderId Chemspider - Identifier (e.g. 4444362)
Returns:
http://www.chemspider.com/Chemical-Structure.4444362.html

inchiKeyToChemspiderId

java.lang.String inchiKeyToChemspiderId(java.lang.String inchiKey = '')
Parameters:
inchiKey InChIKey - (e.g. IKGXIBQEEMLURG-NVPNHPEKSA-N)
Returns:
the Chemspider indentifier. In this case 4444362

inchiToInchikey

java.lang.String inchiToInchikey(java.lang.String inchi = '')
Parameters:
inchi InChI - (e.g. InChI=1S/C27H30O16/c1-8-17(32)20(35)22(37)26(40-8)39-7-15-18(33)21(36)23(38)27(42-15)43-25-19(34)16-13(31)5-10(28)6-14(16)41-24(25)9-2-3-11(29)12(30)4-9/h2-6,8,15,17-18,20-23,26-33,35-38H,7H2,1H3/t8-,15+,17-,18+,20+,21-,22+,23+,26+,27-/m0/s1 )
Returns:
an InChIKey. In this case IKGXIBQEEMLURG-NVPNHPEKSA-N
